Pros1. LPDDR5 RAM. Great on paper. Doesn't display the potential because of throttling.2. Good to have thunderbolt 4. Future proof. Have connected camera, microphone, keyboard, mouse, monitor and soundbar. all works at once through a single type c port hub. Loving it. A great upgrade from my non thunderbolt laptop.3. Type c charging is great. If I forget my laptop charger at home, I can charge it with my 65w mobile warp charger. Handy.4. Wifi 6e. Future proof. Works great with my 5ghz router. Desperate to upgrade the router to have a taste of it. For future.5. Very light. Bought a hp wings backpack specially for this laptop which is just 150g. So 1199+150. 1350g approx. I leave my charger at home. The battery lasts the whole day with a weight of just 1350g. Majja ni life.Cons1. Gets hot while doing nothing. You can feel the heat on the keyboard.2. Charger is too heavy for a light weight laptop.3. Wrong information. No 6 month office 365 included. It asks for purchase. Customer care, no help yet.4. Screen is not HDR. I didn't check before purchasing, considering it as an obvious feature for the price.5. Lots of bloatware, i.e. Spotify and others6. Camera is said as 1080p. My USB 1080p external camera is way better than the inbuilt one. Don't know why so much difference. bad camera.7. Speeds up for the benchmark testing, starts heating and slows down (throttle) in less than 10 seconds. Cannot use i7 processor to its full potential because of throttling. Should have better cooling system.8. Keyboard, useless. As I gear up for touch typing screen starts shaking.9. Touchpad. Too big. Disturbs while typing.Update: Amazon and lg both denied providing 6 month subscription of the office 365. Amazon asked to check what is section what is included in the box not to check the description. Lg asked me to connect Amazon. So no such subscription.

The product is good, but don't expect to get the Office 365 subscription with this laptop. There's no voucher etc. in the packaging, the warranty card is unsigned, and the seller (Appario Retail Pvt. Ltd.) will not email you a product key either. So consider the value of this laptop as being without any Office subscription.The laptop is so incredibly lightweight that it's hard to believe! It's powerful enough for almost everything (except games) but 16 GB is on the low side for a development laptop. Battery life is good & with the included (installed) software one can limit charging to 80% if the laptop is primarily being used at a desk (this feature is very useful in extending the life of the battery).

It is an amazing laptop with a great display.It does heat up so recommend to run it in efficiency mode till you absolutely need more power.Miramatrix features are great but enable them only if necessary.Lg smart assistant is good you can use it to prevent battery charging over 80% to prolong battery life, lock the fn key for the top row and also control fan speed.The keyboard is fine. the trackpad response out of the box was not that good for me so had to configure it in the windows setting now it works fine.The battery life is good and can get up to 9 hrs if you are just browsing. Title: The MSI GF63 Gaming Laptop - A True Gaming Powerhouse!I recently purchased the MSI GF63 gaming laptop, and I must say, it has completely exceeded my expectations in every way possible. This laptop is an absolute game-changer, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.Performance:The MSI GF63 is a beast when it comes to performance. With its powerful Intel Core i7 processor and NVIDIA GeForce GTX graphics card, it handles even the most demanding games and applications with ease. I've experienced buttery-smooth gameplay and lightning-fast load times, making my gaming experience truly immersive.Design:The laptop's sleek and modern design is not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical. It's incredibly thin and lightweight, making it easy to carry around. The slim bezel display provides an immersive visual experience, and the backlit keyboard is not only comfortable for long gaming sessions but also adds a cool factor to the laptop's overall look.Display:The 15.6-inch Full HD display is nothing short of stunning. The colors are vibrant, and the sharpness of the images is impressive. Whether I'm gaming, watching movies, or working on creative projects, the display never disappoints.Cooling:One of the standout features of this laptop is its excellent cooling system. It manages to keep the laptop cool even during intense gaming sessions, thanks to MSI's innovative cooling technology. This ensures that the laptop runs smoothly without any overheating issues.Battery Life:Considering its gaming prowess, the battery life is surprisingly good. I can get several hours of productivity or entertainment on a single charge, making it versatile for both work and play.Audio:The audio quality on the MSI GF63 is exceptional. The built-in speakers deliver clear and immersive sound, and the Nahimic audio enhancer software allows for customizable audio profiles, enhancing the gaming and multimedia experience.Price:Considering the high-end components and top-notch performance, the MSI GF63 offers incredible value for its price. It competes with laptops that are much more expensive but still manages to outperform them in many aspects.In conclusion, the MSI GF63 gaming laptop has won me over completely. It's a powerhouse of performance, style, and value. Whether you're a hardcore gamer or a professional looking for a reliable and versatile laptop, the MSI GF63 is undoubtedly one of the best choices on the market. I couldn't be happier with my purchase, and I highly recommend it to anyone in search of the ultimate gaming laptop.

Hi,I had used Mi notebook ultra and here is my comparison:* Display: On Paper Mi display is better with higher resolution and 90Hz refresh. But The contract I felt is better in Honor than Mi and web pages are more comfortable in Honor. Tough to pick a winner. But I personally liked Honor.* Build: Both are good. This is more compact. light than Mi and better for portability* Performance: I found both are good performance wise* Track Pad: Honor is better. Mi makes bad sounds when clicked. Mi track pad is bigger but sometimes not responsive in the corrners.* Keyboard: I did not find major differences. Both are more or less same. But Backlight is not good in Honor and way better in Mi* Speaker: No competition. Honor is way better than Mi. Mi speaker is almost non existent and cannot be used without external/bluetooth speaker.* Battery Life: I could get around 8 hours playing songs in youtube continuously. Similar test gave only 5 hours in Mi.Support: Not sure about Honor. But you will have may service centers for MiConnectivity: May be better in Mi as it might support thunderbolt and monitor connection on USB C. I have not tested in Mi though.Webcam: Not a dealbreaker but Honor camera angle may not be liked by everyone compared to standard camera positioning in Mi.Value for Money : Honor. That too great value of you get it under 40K. Mi is 12 to 15K more expensive than Honor.Conclusion: It should be an easy decision to buy Honor. You will love it.

Got it for 41000 during a deal. I had been looking for a laptop in the price range of 1-1.2 lakh for some time now. Was waiting for AMD 7040U series to come to India. I bought this laptop for a relative and after using it for a week before handing it over to them i was just blown away. My main concern was battery life and this laptop gave 10 + hours of mixed world uses on battery everyday. I never thought that in something this cheap the battery life could be this good. the CPU is excellent specially the integrated graphics. played Valorant on this. Had a similarly priced core i3 10th gen laptop for comparison with equal ram size. I was getting around 90 fps on the intel version and battery life of 4 hours only. On this i got 150 fps on average and many of my general tasks which are based on CAD based application run very well. I was actually inclined to just buy this again for myself as its well within half of my budget and is capable to handle my daily workflow but decided to wait for zen4 based laptop because ryzen zen4 is even more efficient.

It's not bad, but not good either. I bought it for 38,990. I was getting the same price for some other acer laptop with intel i5 1155g7 processor and IPS display, but I missed the deal. So, I bought this ‚òπÔ∏è.Pros:1- Performance is not an issue. Decent performance for most of the tasks.2- Didn't do gaming, so not sure of that. But for programming, it's good.3- Good for multitasking.4- Audio is good. It's not loud, but sufficient and it comes with Nahimic audio (for which you will have to download it's app) which enhances it's audio capabilities. Audio can be optimised for different purpose.5- Sufficient ports. Also have type C port.6- It has control center to control fan speed, external keyboard light, manage fan speed, power.7- Battery is decent and can last 4-5 hours on regular workload. But on heavy workload, it will last around 2-2.5 hours.8- Lookwise it is good.9- lifetime windows 11 home.Cons:1- Although display is antiglare FHD. It's not IPS, so it looks crisp but average. It's just ok for the purpose of coding or regular tasks where we just want the work to be done. Since viewing angle are bad, so for entertainment, it's good for single person for watching movies but not for multiple people. Display is not good for graphic designer who needs color accuracy.2- There is no backlit keyboard. So, if you want backlit, connect external keyboard with backlit.3- Although it has an SSD, I didn't find the boot time to be faster. It is fast but didn't meet my expectations.4- Graphic card is not dedicated which is just good for normal work. I don't think you will enjoy gaming on it. It can play light games but surely you won't enjoy gaming on such system. And it won't able to play high demanding games.5- Doesn't have activated ms office. You will have to buy it's keys.Note:You can install a separate harddisk (HDD) for storing data. Screws are provided with laptop.For me, the bottom side became very hot and fans started making noise, when it first arrived and I was installing windows updates on it first used it on my bed, that is without proper ventilation. But with proper air flow, it doesn't heat.Conclusion:If you are limited on budget and only want your work to be done and doesn't care much about display quality or back lit keyboard or you aren't a gamer, you can buy it.And if you already bought it, don't regret your decision. It's a ok laptop for most of the task and will get your work done.

The laptop's 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display ensures a vibrant and immersive visual experience, making it ideal for both work and entertainment. Its 8GB RAM ensures smooth multitasking, while the 512GB SSD offers ample storage space and faster data access.The MacBook Air's design is another impressive feature. It is thin and lightweight, making it highly portable. The space gray color gives it a sleek and stylish look, while the backlit keyboard adds to its aesthetic appeal and functionality, allowing for comfortable typing even in low light conditions. The laptop comes with a 1080p FaceTime HD camera, providing users with high-quality video calls. It also features Touch ID, which works with iPhone and iPad, providing an extra layer of security.In conclusion, the 2023 MacBook Air is a well-rounded device that offers a blend of performance, design, and convenience. Whether you're a student, a professional, or a casual user, this laptop is designed to meet your needs. Its powerful features and sleek design make it a worthwhile investment.

I got this action camera yesterday and to be frank ,I was kind of excited to check it out. Because procus is offering a lot with this action camera ,like two batteries and a bucket full of accessories.And that even for such a small price tag.#Unboxing It I received-----------------1xPROCUS RUSH Camera ,1x2.4G Remote Control ,2x1050mAh Battery ,1xWaterproof Case ,1xBicycle Stand , Mount ,2xClip, 1xHelmet Mounts 1xBandages ,5xTethers ,1xProtective Backdoor ,1xUSB Cable, 1xAC Charger, 1xLens Cloth, 1xManual ,1xAccessory Box#REVIEWING THE SPECs---------------------------Procus Rush is a 4K action camera with a 16MP sony CMOS sensor . It is mainly intended for sports usage and a few other applications like a helmet cam ,Diving cam etc.It comes with a 2" LCD display and 170 degree wide angle lens. This camera comes with a 900mAh battery (as stated on the cover) which offers recording time upto 90mins. There are slots for MSD card ,charging ,HDMI.#DESIGN-------------This camera is very small ,you can easily hold it using your fingers. It is extremely portable. Just put it in your pocket and your are good to go. Even with the added waterproof casing it looks portable enough.I would highly recommend to keep the case applied always ,otherwise the lens will get damaged very easily .It already started attracting Oily fingerprints and smudges .Anyway you can easily clean it using the supplied soft clothThe design is very identical to the mighty GoPRO , and someone will surely mistaken this for a GoPRO ,for sure. The waterproof camera housing itself is very Rigid ,it uses a hard plastic material .#BUILD QUALITY-----------------------I would give 10/10 for build quality of the plastic housing . It is surely gonna withstand some rough abuse ,No matter how many times to open it ,or how many you move the mount ,it ain't gonna go faulty. Also the buttons are very stiff ,stiff to press ,but are surely durable.The camera unit is made of soft poly carbonate material but it isn't durable .The battery door itself is flimsy ,it already started bending and looks like it will get damaged very soon if I keep on switching batteries.Anyway the battery will stay in perfectly even without the door ,but only with the case applied .Anyway you should handle it with care and always keep the camera inside the case.#HOW TO GET STARTED ?Well ,the supplied user manual isn't anything useful. So I would let you know the basics.1- Press the power button for 3 sec for turning it ON .(Button is at the front)2-Press the shutter button on the top to snap pictures or start recording.3-Change the recording mode using the mode button (the front power button itself).4-That's enough , you will understand everything else by your own.Note: In menu mode ,the shutter button is the OK button.#CAM QUALITY:------------------------First of ,action cameras are made for outdoor usage .So these are perfect for outdoor shots but not good for Indoor.#Pictures:I snapped some selfies outside my house and found the images really wide .I mean it is really covering a lot of area. Its perfect if you want to take selfies with a lot of heads in the frame. Not just selfies ,other landscape images tuned out great. I mean these are surely not comparable to the expensive go pro ,but considering the cheap price tag ,its a really good bargain. Its very clear and quite accurate.You can easily change the resolution by going through the settings.#VIDEO : I have nothing to complain its more than usable. The 4k isn't anything to be exited about ,I found the 1080p exactly similar to the 4K one ,even though I run it on my 50inch TV. The difference is hardly noticeable .So I will only shoot in 1080p because the output is much more stable and smooth looking. If you are recording videos for more than 20mins itYou can change the resolution and the FPS very easily. 720p slow motion videos are also good.Amazingly the indoor slowmo videos are blur free .I tried recording my ceiling fan running at high speed ,still the video came out really smooth .Didn't expect that .If you are recording videos for longer sessions like more than 10 mins the camera will get little warm ,But don't worry It is fine .The display will turn off automatically to save power and to reduce the heating.Also the max recording time for 1080p on a single run is 15mins.#BATTERY LIFE-----------------------I didn't do an intensive battery test ,but from what I can remember ,I made 15 to 16 videos (1080p ,4k and 720 slow motion combined ,worth 50 mins) and some snaps . Still the battery level is at half. Well That's pretty great. I will update the actually battery review later.#WATERPROOFING---------------------------Keep the case on ,always !!Its completely waterproof ,You can dip it into a swimming pool ,river etc and it will work underwater flawlessly.Take it out in rain or just go put it inside your water tank it will still work.#REMOTE---------------Worked instantly ,no installation required. Very useful for selfies. :)CONCLUSION---------------------To be honest ,its a very good bargain for the price.As I said ,You get a lot for a very low amount ,considering that its an action camera. The final image quality is more than enough for the price.At the same price you are offered action cams from various other brands. Well I have been using procus products for a long time and I can assure you that their after sales service is great.So if you want to claim your 1 YEAR WARRANTY just give them a call.I do have loved an HDMI cable inbox ,for viewing in TV.Overall ,If you are in a budget and can't spend on expensive action cameras ,then go for Procus Rush.nOTE:: Camera samples will be uploaded in a couple of daysI hope you found my review helpful. For any further info contact me by email or drop a comment below.RegardsAbraham

I have Attached a Video Review in which you can check the Camera Functions and Video Quality Recorded from it.Due to Size Constraint I have uploaded small portion of Recording here. To check Detailed Video with all the Functions,Please check the video on my youtube channel - sameers reviewroom, I will attach the Link of that video in comment section.NOTE :@ I am using this Cam with Class 4 SD Card and its Working Flawlessly without any problem.# But there's Significant increase in Performance when Class 10 SD Card is Used, so NOTE this.@ It comes with Waterproof Case and Water resistant Remote Control.@ Most importantly USE only the Charger Provided with it or Plug it to Laptop for Charging OR use 5v 0.5A charger.# Using High output charger may Damage the Cam.@ There's 1 Year Warranty with this Cam.@ Live View is Possible by Connecting the Cam to Smartphone.I am using it since last 2 weeks. Bought this cam Specifically to use it with my Hobby Grade RC Car. So Following are the Observations,BUILD QUALITY :----------------------@ First of all product is Exactly as shown in the description.@ Whole Construction of cam is of High Quality Plastic with Front Velvet finish.@ There's Knurling at all the 4 Edges which makes it Easy to Hold.@ You get all the Accessories shown in the Description Image.@ Most importantly Quality of Waterproof Case is Exceptional.* I dropped it Many times while shooting, still there's not even a single Crack, just few scratches on the edges.* My RC Car runs at speed upto 70 KMPH, so when it falls the impact is tremendous.@ Quality of Carry Case is also good, it has foam cut-outs for placement.Main Camera Unit :-------------------------@ It has 4 physical buttons to Navigate, select and toggle between modes.@ All the Buttons are Accessible even with the Case is ON.@ It also has Micro USB and HD Out Port.1) Modes :--=======There are 3 Basic modes -- 4K, 16 MP, 720p Slow Motion ( 120fps ).@ 4K 30 fps -> In this mode Resolution can be selected from 4k to 720p 30fps.* Quality of 4K videos are awesome and it takes aprrox 150 mb for 1 min of Video Recording.* Snapshots are also possible in 4K mode.@ 16 MP -> Its Snapshot mode, in which you can Directly take the Snaps with single click.* Quality can be adjusted from 16 to 2 MP.* Drama Shot or Burst Mode is Available in 3,5 & 10 P/S.@ 720p 120fps Slow Motion -> It records awesome Slow Motion videos.* There are 2 options - 720p 120 fps and 1080p 60fps.2) Settings :--========@ There's Provision to select settings for Video and Images.@ Also there are Extra settings like Exposure, white balance, Wifi, etc@ You can also select Driving Mode from settings.@ Finally it has basic settings like language, factory setting, etc.Camera Quality :---------------------@ Quality in 4K mode is Great.@ Colour production and Saturation are well above par.@ Low Light Photography is also good.@ Image Quality is also above Average.@ Using the cam at low Resolution mode generates Grain, but that can be adjusted by Exposure settings.@ I guess Time Lapse Mode is Best feature in the cam, which works Great.Battery Performance :----------------------------@ Battery when full charged lasts upto 80 mins with 4K recording.@ It even clocks 100 - 120 mins on Lower Resolutions.@ Battery can only be charged by Inserting it in the camera and plugging the camera with USB.@ Battery can't be charged with Case ON.@ Video can be recorded while charging the battery, but I don't suggest it.@ Once charging RED Led blinks and once Full it stops.Remote Control :---------------------@ It Ready to use remote.@ There's No ON/OFF Switch, just 2 buttons.@ 1st to take Snaps and 2nd to control Video shooting.@ Its also Water resistant.Live View APP :--------------------@ Procus Camera app is for iOS and XDV is for Android.@ I am using iOS and app works flawlessly.@ You can literally control Everything from App. ( All the modes and every settings )@ There's NO LAG at all, Live View works Seamlessly.@ Range of this settings is upto 10 meters as per description, but I got little more than that.@ Connection is done via Wifi.Customer Care :--------------------@ Customer Care is exceptional.@ I had an issue with operating the camera and I mailed to them and Instantly got the Resolution.@ Also you get 1 YEAR Warranty for this Cam.Cons :Only Con is sound recording, you need to Hold the cam close to source for recording the Clear Sound.Rest there's Nothing to Complaint. ( Will Update if any issue arises )VERDICT :Honestly I am bashing this cam with my RC car and its taking all the beating easily, this have Convinced me the Durability of this cam.The Camera Quality is Exceptional considering the Price Point and Top of it there's tons of Accessories given for Free.Last but not the least the Extra Battery adds lot of value to the package.If you don't mind the Sound issue, then this Cam is indeed Best Budget Cam in Current Market.Thank You for reading this review.

I bought this product in April earlier this year. Its an absolute waste of money. Here are a few detailed glows and grows for the product.Pros:1) The battery seemed to last for longer than what was mentioned, also the fact that you get two batteries is pretty neat.2) The carry case is pretty sturdy, and the accessories provided like mounts and straps are of good quality.Cons:1) The app is pathetic and never responds. If you want to rely on the app or control the camera using your phone then you will be very disappointed.2) The video quality is terrible, It is a very shaky and jumpy footage, the clarity in 4K is disappointing, I mounted it once on my bike and had a fairly good video, but on my recent trek the video was horrible. The memory card has remained the same (32GB, Class 10)3) The battery cover is really flimsy and broke the first time I opened it. Very cheap plastic. Now, every time I remove the camera from the case I have to be super careful as the battery case falls off.4) The remote stopped working during my last trip to Nepal in April, a week after I bought the product, last weekend on a short trek it was working again for a short while and then stopped again. so the remote isn't very reliable as well.5) Sound recording quality is horrible and you cannot attach an external mic, so it cannot be used to vlog.I was super excited about my trip to Nepal and thought of making some travel videos. I was warned not to buy the product by a few friends, but I went ahead and got it anyway after watching a few videos on youtube. A horrible investment. My suggestion is to be patient save a little more and buy a better camera. you wont regret the investment. I made a bad choice, please don't make the same mistake.PS: I will try and upload a few more videos on youtube in a while, and will update this review then.

When I have purchased this product and have not heard the brand. Just got the product in the deal. Later I had detailed review in YouTube and explored procus site. If you try in indoor camera doesn't have great quality but not bad too as well. average quality and when you to take in good outdoor light and under water it performed well. Not great but still good worth for the money. I see mixed reviews but actually product is performing well with good battery backup and product accessories also seems to be good. when you use 4k quality battery drains bit quick. We have to play with the product and get use to it. If you are looking for budget version of GoPro. Procus Rush 3.0 is good option.
very smooth grip lightweight 4 k recording very clear. very handy, over all very good product I am reviewing this after using two or three months.

First of all i would like to thank Procus Team for coming up with such a product at this price!Let me start off with the positives of the camera:1) Build of the camera and the provided accessories are of GOOD QUALITY!2) Easy to use buttons and 'click' sound on touch makes it intuitive.3) Daylight shots, both on 4k@30FPS and the 16M still image are impressive and i have not really felt the need of a seperate image stabilizer.4) The field of view on this lens is great! (I fit mine to the front of my motorcycle helmet and the view is good)5) Wtih a 64GB micro SD card and 2 1050mAH batteries, i could record a total of 5-6 hours, which is impressive for this camera!!Now, the negatives of the camera:1) The battery case cover is of very flimsy plastic. When using with my motorcycle gloves, i often felt like it was bending when i wanted to replace the batteries and put back the cover.2) Both, the mic and the speaker are average on this product. Though, i cant really complain much because of the price.3) Night shots are just okay. Lot of noise, especially in areas of very low lighting (When riding through lanes with less streetlights, i found a lot of noise and grainy quality. But shots on main roads and highways were great, so no worries.4) Not really sure if its just me, but my device does not record more than 15mins of video in one go. After 15mins, it starts recording again after about 1-2mins (I guess it processes the previous video until then).All in all, this product is a BANG FOR THE MONEY!!!!With about 23 mounts, waterproof housing, 2 batteries, a WIFI remote and carry case, this product is definitely worth the money!I wish the Procus team all the very best! Waiting for more products like these from you!(P.S. EXTERNAL MIC SUPPORT WOULD BE WELCOMED IN THE "RUSH V 2.0")

Good packaging, supplied with a carry case and lots of accessories(mounts for every situation), a remote and 2 additional batteries. Bought it while the introductory offer was bundles with it.Setting up the camera is easy, along with navigating through the different user modes and settings. The best part of this camera is the WiFi display through your phone using the XDV app.Currently using it on my helmet, the 3M sticky mounts given are strong and even at 180 km/h the camera is held properly with out any shakes! captures decent footage with an okay dynamic range. Too much difference in exposure leads to bright area and dull/dark spots, but video capture is not bad. The sony image sensor does a good job. There's 4k@30fps and 1080p@30fps or @60fps which good enough for everyday things and bike rides! Pictures turn out vivid, slo-mo shots at 720p@120fps is the main highlight of this camera.The only thing about this camera I didn't like was the fact that auto focus isn't present. It's a fixed focus camera. Since it's an action camera I don't things the main intention is to take macro shots, but it would have been nice to see auto focus.The lens offers an angle of 170¬∞ which is really wide!The camera can also be used as a dash camera on your car as it includes driving mode.Underwater shots with the included waterproof casing is possible!There's a remote given too, to start or stop video and take picturesOverall it's the best buy for the price range, as it has 4k WiFi slo-mo with remote control and it's 16M!

First of all the product was shipped very quickly as I was not expecting that fast in 3 days according to my location. The packing was ok or Good. As far as the product, I got all the accessories i.e 20+ accessories, but the down side of those are they are pretty cheap quality. The locking screws literally comes out of its black grip, over all its ok.The camera is Good, the quality of the video is also good as well as for the other functions. But the camera build is so cheap, like literally so cheap that a 10 year old boy can easily squeeze the product by his palm. As for battery, it is not that good or not that bad, if you are going to record a 2 hour continuous 4k video then you will need atleast 4 batteries. The camera heats up quickly when its in waterproof cover, so i recommend you to buy a non waterproof cover where air flow is there. The camera only supports high quality memory card class 10 U3, it supports cheap mermory card too but malfunction used to happen all the time and it Freezes your camera, so use the best SD card for batter performance.Lastly dont use this camera more then 7 to 8 months, by the looks of it, it wont last a year because of the build quality, performance and heating problem. This camera is good for newbies and starter definitely not for hardcore vloggers. Sell this camera after using for 6 to 7 months and upgrade to SJCAM or GoPro.

I was initially skeptical about the product. I use the camera for my Biking and Road Trips. I needed something that would have minimal shake and have a good video recording quality at the same time. Of the options available, I had found that there existed very little difference in the products offered by Procus, SJCam and a couple of others. What made all the difference was that Procus offered me sufficient amount of Accessories and that there was an App that can control the camera functionality without me having to fiddle with the camera or the bluetooth remote that other camera's had offered. To all motovloggers out there, you all know how irritating it is to handle the camera while it is attached to the helmet. Now this app is pretty sweet and extremely handy. I have an old phone which I have deigned to use as a remote for the camera. Connect the camera to the Phone and Boom.... you're set for the ride.The App,The AccessoriesWhat I can only count as a negative on the Camera is the lack of external battery chargers and only 2 batteries. I wish Procus would sell additional batteries and also an external battery charger. (I have an alternative setup, that is more than helpful.)

*The product, procus rush (pro -5) is ok*It has not 4k/ultra HD quality and when we records on 4k or 1080p 60fps, it need suitable player to play on your computer/laptop/mobile*But only its 1080p quality (specially with 30fps) is superb and slow motion is ossum we can play it on any device smoothly(Very good)*We can connect procus rush camera to mobile with OTG or we can remove micro card and insert it on mobile and we can watch the footage.BECAUSE THE APP IS NOT WORKING*Camera is average (when we zoom the image, gets pixelated but if we don't zoom it, the image is fine)*Sound recording and quality is good*It has 170 degree wide-angle lens but it gives image/Video distortion. AndThe lens has no protective cover (bad)*Battery is not charging fully and it gets down in 30min, they give 2 BATTERIES but we have to charge it while inserting in the camera, so why you give 2 BATTERIESThey Not give SEPERATE charger SO, BUY SEPERATE CHARGER OR POWER BANK (Very bad)*They give HDMI slot but they Not give HDMI cable (Very bad)*The Remote control is not working waste waste (Very bad)*The application or the app is worst is not working (very very worst)*They give free accessories at this price (Good) but not bestOverall it is bad product watse moneyDON'T BUY THIS PRODUCTIt was my, first order on Amazon and it is bad experience for meAmazon please give us good quality product what you mention in your discription

Nice product in this price range. We use this product past one month, after that I rate this product with 5 star rating. All features of this camera are very good, specially in 4k mode video quality is far batter compere to other camera in this price segment. Good job team procus.....
Please improve external mic quality & voice cancellation features even i use deadcat mic cap again i face the same problem
video quality decent best battery lifeSD card support not work AP to 128

PRO'sThe image quality is better than expected.The slow motion feature in video is good.The set comes with all major accessories required for a great experience while traveling.CON'sThe video doesn't get captured properly,it lags a lot.The mobile app is pretty much useless.The camera says low speed card even after inserting a class 10 card.Overall a good buy with this price. Build quality is good and accessories are also nicer than expected.

I was in need of an action Camera to use it as a Dash cam & to record my trips as well. I was actually intended in getting a Go pro as I had a huge craze for it but I just came across this Action camera & driven by the High no of positive reviews I decided to make a purchase.Upon Recieving the product , It met all my expectations:The Image & Video Quality is Excellent in all the Resolutions n Videos Recoreded in Low light condtitions are good in higher resolutions .4K is simply great &the handy remote is Extremely useful.Moreover, it comes with tons of accessories which other Brands Don‚Äôt offer & thus adds great value to the purchase .The customer care is very Friendly & Prompt in answering your queries.But However, the Procus Rush App in Ios & Android is Extremely Sluggish, Unresponsive at times & your Recorded Videos of any Resolutions buffer a lot when you want to play it & this gets really annoying .I took this issue to this Customer care & they said they will look over it but they still haven‚Äôt solved the problem as of yet even after Sending all the recorded Videos to them having the buffer.Thus the lag still Persists in the App.Coming to the battery life,upon testing one of the two batteries I could just record upto 60 mts approx in 1080p resolution & I don't find that really Impressive.The Camera also Heats up when recorded for a long time but that doesn‚Äôt bother me much.So Overall, this a great Buy for beginners who are looking for a budget Friendly action Camera.The Various add-ons in the form of Extra batteries,Remote & Most Importantly the Carry case in which you can store all of the accessories that came with the camera are a major factor to chose Procus over other the others & Finally I would also like to Thank Procus for Saving me a lot of money.

After doing an extensive research on all kinds of action camera in this budget range,I finally settled for Procus Rush 4k cam for my trip, where lots of water activities were pre-planned, and this cam didn't disappoint at all.PROs:-Underwater videos, Normal videos ,slow Mo videos, time lapse everything worked perfectly in all resolutions. Connecting it to mobile n controlling it via wifi is easy. Remote works absolutely fine. All mounts are trustworthy.Cons:-The only reason I didn't give it 5 star is becoz of its mic, though it does the job but I feel there is surely some room for improvement, I hope procus team does something about it. And low-light imaging n video may disappoint u.But hey, this is an action cam and at this price range I would definitely recommend it to any1.If u are reading this review, then go no further and buy this coz few days back I was in ur position too n bought this after covering all aspects. :)Cheers.

Received the product on time and in very good packaging.I love that Procus have put a lot of extra accessories, a sturdy hard carrying case and extra battery with the camera! You can see how clear the camera is. I bought this camera because I wanted an affordable action camera. Though GoPro camera are the first thing that come to mind when action cameras are discussed, they are super expensive compared to this. And the fact that they need to be imported with no customer support here in India only adds up to the cost. I am really glad I chose this little guy! I did a lot of research before buying this. I watched videos of people filming with this camera. For the price you can't beat this one.There are 20 accessories, a remote, a hard case, and an extra battery. This is like a complete package with almost all of the mounting options for an action camera that can possibly be there! That helps focus on getting all the kinds of shots that you want, without needing to worry about the how.Also, it has the following video modes - 4K 30FPS,2.7K 30FPS,1080P 60FPS,1080P 30FPS,720P 120FPS,720P 60FPS,720P 30FPS and up to 16 megapixel for photos. There is a settings panel where you can adjust these things as well as things like white balance.I am planning a trip to Himachal Pradesh this month and needed a camera that will withstand the water and be able to shoot action videos and photos and not have to worry about having my good camera ruined. I haven't clicked many pictures or movies yet, except to learn how to use it. I'll update the videos from my trip once I return!Hope this helped.

I ordered this camera for my Vlogs and videos on the go. Got the delivery in 2 days and I was excited to use it. So I am writing this review after using it for 1 week.BOX CONTENT* Procus Rush Camera* 22 Accessories from bike mount to helmet mount, car mount and much more.* Accessories Box to keep your things in order.* Water proof casing of the camera* 3 batteries one in camera, two in the boxAfter using for a week use my experienceBuilt quality is good and solid, even after 2-3 accidental drops, camera survived. Its size is so small, 2 inch in length and 1.5 in height and 1 inch is width. It have a LCD on back which works as a view finder. This cam is great for outdoor and traveling shooting while in daily life adventure, Vlogging, Motologging, underwater, kids slow motion and their activity recordings. Battery provided works for 1.5-2 hour depending upon the recording quality you choose. You can make slow motion and time lapse videos on this cam also. With the waterproof casing on it you can shoot some great under water shots and fun activities.Pros-1. Very Good 4k action camera in just price of 7000.2. Full of accessories, so dont have to buy anything separately.3. Waterproof mount have all the controls, no need to open again again.Cons1. LCD screen is not touch screen.2. Low-light photos and videos are a bit dark.3. Cannot be used as an alternative to DSLR as the quality of photos and videos are not for still photography.4. No a camera for youtubers, but definitely for Travel and vloggers.

First off, one must not compare this action camera to a GoPro. It has been a few months since I started using this camera. Aside from the battery door already being broken upon receiving, here are a list of Pros and Cons that I have come acrossPros:1. Footage quality is quite good.(Excellent for 1080p @ 60fps)2. There are a lot of accessories that comes with it.(I would recommend going for the set with the additional battery.)3. Battery lasts for an average of 1¬Ω to 2 hrs(1080p @ 30fps)4. WiFi option to view live/recorded footages from a smartphone.5. It's so light weight, you sometimes forget it is already mounted.Cons:1. Build quality is a bit too flimsy2. Tends to shut down due to heating3. Aside from display, no audio indication to know whether it has begun or stopped recording.4. There is a bit of a lag in the WiFi connection.5. When switching batteries, the date resets.(May be an issue for vloggers when organising the logs on day to day basis)6. No external battery charger available, yet.

So I bought this camera to record my mountain bike journeys. See the 1st problem which I faced was that this camera has 0 stability. I could have bought a normal camera and it would have the same stability. Most people don't even have 4k displays so there's no point investing in 4k quality you guys should have gone for 1920 ' 1080 quality and better stability cause thats what I want in my budget action camera . This is great for scuba diving id say but not for adventures .

Pros:1. EIS works superb2. Battery life is more than expected3. So many accessories make camera practical4. Quality in day time is superb5. Multiple shooting modesCons:1. Mic is of no use if you are using for motovlogging2. Average video quality at night time3. Video size is very large for the quality. Can capture 4 hrs on 59GB with 1080p 60fps. Can capture 34 minutes on 15GB with 4K 60fps

Bought the Procus Rush 4K Action Camera from Amazon @ 7200/- on Diwali sale. First of all good packing and fast delivery by Amazon. I would say this is a great camera with this price range. You will be getting around 23 accessories including 2 batteries, remote and various clips for hooking up the camera and lot more. Pretty good quality in daylight on 1080P 60FPS. Camera works great on motion and time lapse recording. I am using XDV app for both my android and iOS phone which is connecting well and will be able to see the live view and can change the settings also will be able to view and download recordings and snapshot. Bought a class10 micro SD card of 64GB, which is recommended for 4K recording. I took some sample videos in both 4K and 1080P 60FPS. Its better to record in 1080P 60FPS than 4K for satisfying video clarity and to save storage. Great clarity in daylight using the 1080P. Low light usage will be bit dissatisfying. Slow motion and time lapse is also working great. Also put the camera in water for some time just to check the waterproofing ability and its like a WAW. Waiting to explore it more and will update you all.The camera is slightly getting heat while charging, i think its quite normal and OK. But, could have given a separate battery charger for the easy charging, the only option we have is now to put the batteries inside the camera itself for charging. Which is a BIG drawback. Display is not up to mark but still feel like its enough and ok. Rest all is impressive, picture quality, setup, usage. Highly recommended for all who looking for a good action camera with this price range. Go For It Guys.

Procus Rush is a good action camera. The clarity with Full HD video is pretty good. Most suited for bright light videography. Low light videos and photos has grains. As the camera is designed to have a wide angle coverage, the close angle videos, is a bit curved. Does not give a natural feel. It would have been good if the camera adjusts its focal length depending on if it's a closed shot or an outdoor wide angle shot. Best suited for taking scenery out doors. Underwater video is pretty good. There are host of accessories provided and we are clueless about many of them for what they are used and how to best use them. I understand from Procus executive that they are in the process of doing a video explaining the accessories and how to use them. That would be a good addition. Battery back up is decent. Only thing is it's a take a long time to charge. But it's manageable if you can plan it well . At this price it's value for money.

At the price it is at, it is a value for money proposition. Good video quality but i felt that the image stabilization could have been slightly better, especially for the bike riders, however i think if used on a car it should be fine.Overall a good product..... Must buy for all the vloggers.

Seemed like a pretty good deal, going by the price it is offered at. I'm listing my observations after a year of use :(i) Lots of accessories. A good carrying case. Camera looks premium.(ii) It supports 1080p HD recording with inbuilt slow motion mode.(iii) Good seal even after submerging the camera (with case) approx 1 feet inside water. Not a single drop found inside.(iv) Video recording is decent at least. Don't expect viewable results in low light. Zero stabilization.Occasionally the video doesn't record or stops automatically after a couple of minutes. That is irritating and I cannot rely on the camera to record weddings or important events.(v) Photo quality is decent in lit conditions. Okay for social media. Quality is nowhere near a DSLR, so better not to compare any further.(vi) Customer service is okayish.(vii) Battery is a real bummer. Barely last 3 hours.(viii) Build quality is not really that good. One of the volume/zoom buttons on the right got caved inside within the first 6 months of use. Customer service wasn't of much help in the first try, and I couldn't make time later due to exams & interviews, so it's still like that. Usable definitely, but you need to apply extra pressure to get the button to work.Overall verdict : Buy only if you're stripped of funds and if there aren't any better options in your budget. Else, save and buy a GoPro.

First of all this camera has a lot of accessories.Its quality is good keeping the price in mind.I have done a review of this on my YouTube channel moto wired. Go and watch full review.You'll get stabilization till 4k 30fps.This camera can record upto 4k 60fps.It has much more features , visit my YouTube channel for all the things.

Procus action camera is a camera which is unknown to many people..some think its a helmet camera or something else. But according to me its a camera which gets fit in any of the environment for eg in hot summer use ,chilled winter, moreover the unique feature's of this camera are as follows: you can also call it pros1. Can be used underwater (both video and photography)2. It includes more than required mounts so can be attached to any surface.3. One can also use with the wifi. So it also works as a hidden one .4. Video quality is quite good when watched in laptop or some other device.5. Includes slow motion, time lapse etc.CONS:1. Sound quality is very poor but only if u hear the sound in the cam itself. You are not able to hear a single thing.. but if put in laptop one can hear the sound ok types.2. Battery drains very fast..approx in 45 to 60 min but thank god procus have provided extra battery too.Rest all is perfect..

I bought this action camera from Amazon during great Indian sale at discounted price n it delivered within 2-3days, Amazon packing was great, Now about Procus camera Built quality is good @this price, built in Wi-Fi n comes with 15+ accessories with a nice carry bag, highly recommended for those who are looking for a budget action camera for different purposes, video quality is good it's been 5 months since I am using this camera fir my Motovlogging find no issue till date best thing it comes with 2 batteries which helps me a lot during my motovlogging, only one suggestion to Procus team it would be great if it comes with external mic option rest everything is good.Now about after sales service of Procus,Recently got some hanging issue not big with my action camera n sent it to service centre Chandigarh Hatts off to Procus team they support n helped me a lot n resolved my action camera problem within a day they received, Great after sales service of Procus.ThanksVarun Saini

I have not been able to locate an action camera that delivers so much at this price.I had bought a VR set from Procus and that was of high quality so I reposed my faith again by buying this camera.Yes, the frugal price is reflected in the slightly low grade plastic material. Specially the battery cover which looks like it will need very careful and delicate handling to prevent it from snapping into two, specially where the tang slides into the body to fit it over the battery compartment.The various accessories are fine. One can register the device on the Procus website by entering the unique product number. This will help in warranty issues.The Procus app is just superb save for one aspect. One has to connect the camera on WiFi to the fone by accessing the Procus Wifi spot thru the Wifi settings of the fone and not thru the app. Once that is done, connection is established immediately. The deficiency is that there is no way to keep a copy of the foto or video on the fone. If only this facility is activated by Procus, the app will also get 5 stars and more. This app is crucial to align the camera at exactly the correct elevation and azimuth when mounted on the helmet. Nobody else but the app can do it perfectly.My verdict? A perfect camera at this price for the beginner moto or aqua or sky vlogger. You want higher quality of everything? Then get the GoPro series else this is sufficient for most needs

Bought this camera and wasn‚Äôt really expecting a lot from it..especially 4K quality..but to be honest, it exceeded my expectations (especially the 1080p mode)..used it for a good two hours and even made a couple of videos and the performance of this camera was above average! I‚Äôm yet to see what it films like when I go for sky diving (trust me I will) but the footage that I‚Äôve already got on this camera speaks for itself...Yes there are some flaws in it‚Ä¶(like the 4K is not the real 4K obviously), but the output on a class 10 memory card is pretty amazing for all modes. Slow motion and timelapse are simply kickass and I think in this price range this camera is slayin it..I recently went to Kolkata and had some time to kill so I made a vlog using this camera which I‚Äôve also attached in the review..Hope it helps all those out there who are still in a quandary as I‚Äôve used all the modes of this camera in the video..but believe me I know what I paid for and I got what I wanted..rest is your decision..I‚Äôm thinking of shooting a dance video using this camera coz I wanna see if this can fulfill my requirement in that area too and I might just upload that video in my review as well..

Pros:1) PRICE of Action Camera with Accessories is USP2) Offered with so many Accessories3) Decent Cover for Action camera and accessories at this price point.4) Can expect good service.5) External MIC provided in package that's important for action camera.Cons:1) Ok Image Quality2) Battery life could have been better3) You cannot connect any external MIC as it's not 3.5 jack. So you have to rely on provided MIC.

I purchased it for moto vlogging and my budget wasn't too high. I got to know about Procus Rush 2.0 and it is the best camera under this price category. Image stabilisation and quality of the video is also good. For night view if there will be external light then it works well too. Good action camera to start with.
This is a pathetic product. Make quality is so cheap,

This camera comes with lot of accessories but lacks severely in its performance.1. The quality of the photos is worse. My 13Mp mobile camera shoots better photos than this camera.2. The quality of 4k videos is good, but I can't really judge as I have not used any other camera to record 4k videos. It seemed fine, but the battery consumption is equally high in 4k video mode.3. The app provided for this camera is so premature and lacks basic functionality. This was the major turn off for me. College students in their free time build better apps than this. Procus should really fix this.4. You can only view the latest 8 photos/videos when connected to the camera in app. And it won't even play the videos that I recorded. The only way I could watch the videos was after I transferred the files to my PC or in the camera itself without proper audio.5. Once you have connected to camera in the app, your camera will only display the WiFi information (pic attached) and you can't go ahead and click photos. To do so, you have point the camera and check in your phone for what it's shooting and than click. It's troublesome.6. They have mentioned 23 accessories, but they have counted even the wrist band for camera and wiping cloth as an accessory which was completely not necessary and premature.7. Only a couple of minutes after I received it and I was exploring the options. And bamm!! It hangs. Check the photo attached. The app provided hangs a lot too.8. My requirement was to use this camera while riding, click lot of photos and for timelapse. This camera seems to satisfy only one of my requirement and that too only for couple of hours if iam recording in 4K. Returned it.9. If you're going to buy it even after this explanation, go for the one with extra battery. You'll thank me later.

This is the first action camera we have bought. It was a gift for my 10 yr son. With that perspective it has been an amazing purchase. We have traveled to Sikkim, Arunachal and Meghalaya and used it as a dashcam as well as underwater.The timelapse is good as well as videos in 1080p. Photos not as good as my smartphone but that is understandable. Bty life is decent and the spare bty ensured that 5hr time lapse videos possible. Will upload videos and snaps shortly.User interface is decent and the mob app is just ok..lots of glitches. My son is able to use it easily.Final Verdict:- it's not a GoPro..but definitely worth the price. Consider it as a stepping stone to a costlier model. This way u will get familiar with the working of an action cam as well as realise whether you are really interested in making such an investment.
there is not available mobile app for android user

I was very skeptical about the product especially at the competitive price point that they are selling at. But to my surprise, the camera surpassed my expectations. I could use itanywhere and everywhere, whether underwater, strapped to my bike, it did it‚Äôs bit. The best part is all the accessories are provided for, so you are ready to go from the time the shipment arrives at your place.I was able to capture some amazing videos and pictures with this camera. Be it the colour variations during sunsets or different hues of blue underwater, the camera proved its mettle.Just a couple of things that they should work on:‚Ä¢ tends to heat up when it is in the waterproof case‚Ä¢ the pictures and video get a bit grainy when you zoom‚Ä¢ performance could get better in low light conditionsIn all, an absolute value for money product and I would recommend every budding photographer to go for it.

The video is best recorded at 1080 60fps with EIS on, i did moto vlogging on it and the video Quality was very nice also the Stabilisation was decent thanks to EIS. only problem was the sound recording quality from external mic it is below average.Many accessories were provided in the package which is nice along with pouch for carrying.This is the best value for money product for the beginners, also if you are professional, you can use this as secondary camera for mounting it on back of your motorcycle or chassis.Go for it. Great option for beginners.

Product is not as good as expected reading the reviews and watching few online YouTube reviews. We use camera mainly for taking good quality photos/videos. Hoping the same, I purchased the camera especially for my trip to Finland recently. Before traveling, I called service centre numerous times for extra battery as they had provided just 2 batteries. But was not provided the same. I even agreed on collecting it from their Chandigarh office but that was not sorted. And when I did travel, I faced battery issue. I was recording my skiing video in time lapse but the battery soon went dead without me realising it. It was really bad to realise later that the video was just recorded for few minutes.On coming back from my trip, I transferred all the video to my computer hoping for a nice quality (based on previous reviews). It was really disappointing to see blurry videos.I received a call later from their call centre asking me about product review and to leave an Amazon comments. I told all the above to the call centre and in response they told me that at this budget price, I will receive this much quality only.All in all just okay camera. I wish someone had told me earlier only that at this budget price I will receive a just okay camera, I would have made a proper learned decision before only and not just going by other product reviews which I now assume could be fake.

I've been using this for past 10 days. Great product.Pros:PriceDescent FeaturesAccessoriesServiceWarranty (easy to avail and reliable)I don't think it has relevant cons as for the given price range you know the device would not give amazing performance.Low light performance is average.You'll definitely get grainy output in low light or while using a memory card below class 10.For photography, although the burst mode is good with respect to frame rate. I'd recommend a normal entry level dslr or a simple point and shoot. This action cam is recommended for entry level videographers (not photographers)If you are just starting and trying your hand on videography go for it, without a doubt this is the best in this range.I'll use it on a trek and upload the video link here.In case you have any doubts contact me on Instagram at @abhimanyu69Thank you.

Everything is good about this product except its memory card wants format when inserted to PC/Mobile. You can copy data using USB though.==PROS==1. Good quality material used for manufacturing.2. Using Waterproof case you can also hear sound.3. Accessories are heaven for rider.4. Night vision is good but not best.5. Battery works nonstop for 1Hr on HD recording.6. Camera fell from lose mount but still no scratches on body.7. Handling of camera on water proof case is damn good.==CONS==1. Waterproof case added blurred round edges in video2. You can not connect/insert memory card to computer/mobile directly as it requires formatting of data.3. Video are shot in name sequence but some videos are not in sequence and showing wrong date of creation. Dont know why.Otherwise its best budget action camera ever.

I bought this camera a week ago for my cycling videos but I feel stupid after buy this. Here is Detailed experience of me with procus rush.Here are problems which this camera have1.It gets hang after every 10 minutes ya seriously very bad experience when I ride about 5km bicycle and thinking everything is recorded but nothing was recorded because camera get off mid way and nothing saved.At home I kept camera for recording and it did 40 minutes record non stop then I figured out problem and it was loose battery casing. Both battery are very loose in camera so they shake and camera get off while recording in shaky conditions like riding.2. WiFi connection is not so stable if you keep your mobile data network on then connect with camera Wi-Fi is really irritating it continuously getting hang and WiFi connection speed is very slow around 1.5 Mbps while it goes very fluctuate.3. Video lag- During recording I found video lag in many times. I record a 18 minutes video and there was 6 minutes length of video was useless because of buffer, lagging and crop frame.4. Screw size- screws holders are a bit big they create problem with waterproof casing.5. Biggest issue it is not true 4K at 4K record it record about 2k and at 720p it records only 480p quality compare to a 10000‚Çπ smartphone camera.6. No option available for shutter speed and ISO during photo and photo quality is not upto mark.This camera claimed it has SONY imx image sensor but true I don't have it.Casing and accessories material quality is good.

The standout feature of the PHILIPS Indoor Security Camera is its impressive 2K resolution. The clarity of the video feed is outstanding, providing sharp and detailed images. Even when zooming in, the picture quality remains remarkably clear, enabling me to capture important details when needed.I can confidently say that this camera has exceeded my expectations in various aspects, while also leaving some room for improvement in audio quality because the volume output might not be sufficient for certain scenarios. During live communication through the mobile app, I found that the audio was clear and easily understandable in quiet indoor settings. However, in environments with background noise or larger rooms, the volume might not be loud enough to have a conversation effectively.The camera's motion detection capabilities work impressively well. It promptly sends notifications to my smartphone whenever it detects movement, ensuring that I am instantly informed of any potential security threats or unusual activities.

Honestly, the motion detection is efficient. At night somebody might come and it will alarm me instantly!The resolution of this camera is okay but not clear enough. the night vision camera is also good but it creeps me up

I found this camera to exactly match my requirements. I needed one to monitor my baby when I'm away from home. The cam works perfectly well with home wifi and the night vision is superb. I feel the camera is worth the price provided Philips stays true to their 2 year replacement warranty.
Overall good product but keep in mind it can't save to drive.

Have been using the product for last one month. Very good experience and would definitely recommend buying.Some of the highlights of the product.. Very easy to install and getting started. Connection and app onboarding was smooth and easy.. The Video quality is very good and camera movement through Philips app was quite responsive.. Particularly like the multiple mode settings in Philips Home Safety app which allows to select between At home/Away/Silent. Makes it easy to manage the notifications.. Night vision is quite good. This also has coloured night video capturing functionality, basically it has inbuilt leds light which turns on in dark.. Night Vision setting of auto, turns on the led whenever it detects motion at night. Another indirect advantage of this mode, this camera can be used as motion sensing light.. Was able to install 128GB micro SD card and set the recording mode to continuos. It stores approx 10 days of data with 128 GB card.

U can use it with a 20000 mah Powerbank for more than 24 hours. No electricity needed if used with Powerbank because the connectors of the device is micro USB one side and USB type A on the other side which supports Powerbank. Decent camera. Good night vision. Fixed focus, no pan, tilt, zoom.

I was going on a 15 day long trip and had to keep our cat at home - with a maid taking care of him for 1 hour daily. But for the rest of the day we'd be terrified of what our cat would be doing alone and so I ordered this camera. Now there are much cheaper ones available on the market including from Godrej - but this one had the best reviews. So I didn't do too many calculations and went with this.And boy was my decision correct!!! The camera offers exceptionally high quality feed - and any time my cat moved - it would notify me with a live view of what the cat was doing.I have tested this in night also and still the feed is exceptionally high quality. I'd say if you are buying this camera for something important, then definitely dont try to save that money dont go for cheaper cameras on the market. This one is definitely worth it.BUT:a. Motion Tracking: The camera offers motion tracking wherein it will follow a moving object (with its 180 degree swivel). But this motion tracking sucks!! Given the premium charge on the camera - it shouldn't suck this bad but even if the object is moving in one line in the forward direction the camera will jerk backwards 2-3 times in 10 seconds giving a very bad motion tracking experience.b. iPhone Setup Issue: I used my iPhone SE 2020 to setup this camera and after 50 attempts (I have even posted a question here on the amazon QnA) I couldn't set it up. Which made me think the camera is defective or Im doing something wrong. But when I tried on an android device it setup in an instant. Literally an instant. May be it was a problem with my particular iphone model, but I am pretty technically savvy and I still couldnt figure out how to set it up on my iphone. (I setup on android device and logged into my account on my iphone - which worked on my iphone se - then I logged out of the android device.)Ill still highly recommend this device with 5 stars - very good quality.

Cameras are good overallPicture quality is good tooFeatures are good and it easy to setupOnly issue I am facing is of the camera over exposing bright subjects and under exposing dark subjectsIn the picture I have uploaded, the background is too bright and it is overexposed but the foreground is dark and one cannot see the faces if someone comes in.This probably is fixable with a software update. But doubtful that philips will do that.I have some CP plus cameras too which do not have this issue albeit the quality of the picture is bad, but it does not have exposure issues.

Its outstanding video quality, advanced features, and durable build make it a must-have for anyone looking to enhance their outdoor security. I recently purchased the Philips Smart 360¬∞ WiFi Outdoor Security Camera HSP3800, and I am thoroughly impressed with its performance and features. Here's a comprehensive review highlighting its key strengths:360-Degree Coverage: The camera's ability to provide a complete panoramic view of my outdoor surroundings is outstanding.High-Quality Video: The camera records in crisp 1080p HD with night vision capabilities.Easy Installation: Setting up the camera was a breeze. The accompanying app guides you through the process, and the mounting hardware is robust and straightforward.App: The dedicated app allows for seamless remote monitoring. It's user-friendly and offers features like real-time alerts, two-way audio.Smart Motion Detection: The motion detection technology is precise and adjustable.Weather Resistance: The camera's robust build is designed to withstand various weather conditions.Multi-User Access: I can provide access to family members or other trusted individuals, enabling them to monitor the camera feed simultaneously.In summary, the Camera HSP3800 is an excellent investment for those seeking a comprehensive outdoor surveillance solution. Its panoramic view, high-quality video, and user-friendly features make it a top-notch choice for anyone looking to enhance their home security.

This Philips indoor security camera is a game-changer for home monitoring. Its 2K resolution and 360¬∞ panoramic view provide crystal-clear footage and unparalleled coverage. It has feature that allows you to adjust the camera's angle remotely, while two-way talk lets you communicate with loved ones or intruders. Motion and sound detection ensure you're always in the know, and enhanced night vision guarantees round-the-clock security. The Philips Smart 360¬∞ WiFi Outdoor Security Camera is a remarkable addition to any home security setup, offering a comprehensive range of features that ensure both safety and convenience.The inclusion of colour night vision is a game-changer. Unlike traditional black and white night vision, the camera captures vivid and clear colours even in low-light conditions, offering enhanced visibility and making identifying objects and individuals a breeze.The motion and sound detection capabilities are impressively accurate, effectively minimizing false alarms. This feature has given me peace of mind, as I receive prompt notifications whenever there's activity detected in the camera's field of view. The two-way talk feature is another highlight, allowing me to communicate with visitors or deter potential intruders using the built-in microphone and speaker.The setup process was surprisingly straightforward. The camera seamlessly connected to my WiFi network, and the accompanying app provided an intuitive interface for controlling and managing the camera's settings. The app also offers remote access, enabling me to view the live feed and recorded footage from anywhere using my smartphone or tablet.

I recently purchased the Xiaomi 360¬∞ Home Security Camera 1080p 2i, and overall, I'm quite impressed with its performance. This camera offers a great range of features and functionality that make it a valuable addition to any home security setup.One of the standout features of this camera is its 360-degree viewing capability. With the ability to rotate the camera lens in all directions, I can easily monitor my entire room without any blind spots. The image quality is excellent, providing clear and crisp 1080p resolution footage. I appreciate the wide-angle lens that captures a broader field of view, ensuring I don't miss any important details.Setting up the camera was a breeze thanks to the user-friendly mobile app provided by Xiaomi. The app allows for easy pairing with the camera and provides a seamless experience for accessing the live feed, adjusting settings, and reviewing past recordings. The camera also supports two-way audio communication, enabling me to speak with people on the other end of the camera through the app, which is a convenient feature.The camera's night vision capabilities are impressive. Even in low-light conditions, I can still see a clear image, which is crucial for maintaining security during nighttime hours. The motion detection feature works reliably, sending timely notifications to my smartphone whenever movement is detected within the camera's field of view. It gives me peace of mind, knowing that I will be alerted if there's any suspicious activity.One area where the Xiaomi 360¬∞ Home Security Camera could be improved is its cloud storage options. While the camera supports local storage via a microSD card, it would have been nice to have a more robust cloud storage solution for added convenience and peace of mind. However, considering the affordable price point of this camera, it's a minor drawback.In terms of build quality, the camera feels sturdy and well-made. The design is sleek and blends well with my home decor. The camera's compact size makes it easy to position in various locations around the house. Additionally, the camera's motorized pan and tilt function operate smoothly and quietly.Overall, the Xiaomi 360¬∞ Home Security Camera 1080p 2i is a reliable and feature-packed device that provides excellent value for the price. Its 360-degree rotation, high-quality video resolution, and night vision capabilities make it a top contender in the home security camera market. While the cloud storage options could be improved, it remains a solid choice for anyone looking to enhance their home security setup. I highly recommend this camera for its affordability and performance.

I highly recommend this camera to parents who leave their children at home. The video and sound quality are exceptional; you can hear conversations clearly. However, the voice clarity when using the app to talk is not as good. Additionally, it automatically reconnects to Wi-Fi after a power failure.

The camera is ok. I am running a 64 GB card which backs up approximately a week's worth of footage. Installation and setup was easy, just needs a stable wifi. Can cover a wide area with 360¬∞ rotation and field of view is good too. I am getting notifications too about events unlike many others. The quality is decent but that's about it for its features.Now for the issues-1. I chose this over its competitors due to NAS but it's just a gimmick. My laptop, phone and all other devices can recognise my NAS but this camera couldn't. I tried all tricks in the book(rather the internet) but it just couldn't recognise my NAS.2. Other cameras has motion/subject tracking, this doesn't.3. It doesn't recognise half of the activities. I have it faced at the entry gate of my house. It gives notification about some random activity where some pixel has changed but half of the activities happening right infront of it isn't recognised. I have passed so many times infront of it, even faced it, but it only captured my activity once. Its activity recognition is not to be dependent upon, you would have to review your footage manually.4. If you have to download a portion of the video to your local device, you have to press the record button while running the footage and then let it run at 1X. I can't just point it to the first and last point on the timeline and let it finish NOOOOO, you can't even speed up the footage while "recording", you would have to sit there and wait for the footage you've reviewed 10 times to record again.5. The camera quality is not very good. The picture is grainy and not very clear. The quality (if judged by the resolution) is better on the realme cam at the same price.6. The playback at 16X sometimes is very jittery. It gets stuck so much that it renders that feature completely useless sometimes but other times works fine.7. Oh and good forbid you lose your internet connection, it'll stop recording altogether. I had my internet go out for a couple of hours but I thought that it might be writing that data on the SD card since writing there won't require any internet connection. When the internet connected again, the footage of that time was just missing. WHY?8. This is just a minor bug that the camera calibration button in the app has no confirmation message. If you accidently press it, it'll just start calibrating. There should be a confirmation popup on it like we have on delete.There might be some other issues which I'm forgetting but this is the crux of it. I wish I had purchased the realme cam but I can't say for sure if that would not have these or some other issues.

Recently, I decided to try the MI Xiaomi Wireless Home Security Camera 2i 2022 Edition, and I have been impressed with its performance, features, and affordability. Here is a detailed review of this security camera.Image Quality and Performance:The MI Xiaomi Wireless Home Security Camera 2i 2022 Edition boasts a 1080p full HD resolution, providing crisp and clear images during the day. The infrared night vision feature ensures excellent visibility in low-light conditions, allowing for continuous monitoring throughout the day and night. The 130-degree wide-angle lens offers extensive coverage, reducing blind spots and capturing a broader view of the monitored area.Ease of Installation and Use:One of the standout features of this security camera is its ease of installation and use. The camera connects wirelessly to your home Wi-Fi network, eliminating the need for complicated wiring or professional installation. The user-friendly MI Home app allows for seamless setup, live streaming, and remote access from your smartphone or tablet, making it easy to monitor your home while on the go.Motion Detection and Alerts:The MI Xiaomi Wireless Home Security Camera 2i 2022 Edition is equipped with intelligent motion detection, which sends instant notifications to your smartphone or tablet when any unusual activity is detected. This feature ensures that you are always aware of what is happening in your home, providing peace of mind and added security.Two-Way Audio:This security camera features a built-in microphone and speaker, allowing for two-way audio communication. This function is particularly useful for communicating with family members, pets, or even potential intruders in real-time.Data Storage and Security:The MI Xiaomi Wireless Home Security Camera 2i 2022 Edition offers multiple storage options, including local storage via a microSD card and cloud storage through the MI Cloud service. The camera's secure encryption ensures that your data remains protected and private.Affordability:One of the main selling points of the MI Xiaomi Wireless Home Security Camera 2i 2022 Edition is its affordability. Despite its impressive features and performance, this security camera is competitively priced, making it an excellent option for homeowners on a budget.Minor Drawback:The only minor drawback of this security camera is that it requires a stable Wi-Fi connection to function optimally. In areas with weak or inconsistent Wi-Fi signals, the camera's performance may be affected.In conclusion, the MI Xiaomi Wireless Home Security Camera 2i 2022 Edition offers excellent value for money, providing high-quality images, advanced features, and ease of use at an affordable price. With a 5-star rating, I highly recommend this security camera to anyone looking for a reliable and budget-friendly home security solution.

EDIT after 1.5 years of 24x7 usage============================Still going strong! Never failed even once. Happy that my sd card is still functional too. The camera is placed outside in a a shade, for details please refer to the review below.EDIT after 7 months of 24x7 usage=============================The camera still works great. It has been deployed in my (covered) porch outside in Rajasthan from the day I bought it, so it faces dust and weather abuse (temperature 1-2deg in winters, ~50deg in summers). I thought of testing its outdoor capabilities, although it is stated that this is an indoor cam. It is behaving pretty well till now, nothing out of place or different than when this guy was new. Upcoming scortching summers will test it inside out, and if it stays stable throughout, I am getting 3-4 more for coverage! I somehow didn't get this level of reliability and features in any outside-rated cam available.===========================================Just received and my God! What a little beast it is. Loads of features in this negligible amount Motion detection (3-level sensitivity adjustment), custome pan/tilt positions, camera sharing, night vision, alarm system, near 360 pan, great fov, decent 1080p, recording on phone (haven't tested sd-card thing, but it is said that it supports that too). Configuring was a breeze. It also has both speaker and microphone, so you can speak something 'into' the camera from wherever you are, and obviously can hear from the camera too. Both these things work decently, I've tested their stability well.Most important thing, its completely hassle free, install and forget thing. Once configured, if the power goes off, it'll be ready for use, auto-connected to wifi once power is back (I know its an obvious requirement, but still I loved that). You can use the app to see the live feed & record on your phone itself (in addition to sd card in the cam) anywhere in the world, and pan/tilt remotely. I've played with almost every feature and let me tell you, its a serious deal. Build quality could use some more thoughts, but this is supposed to be used inside. Looks are great. Also the alarm sound levels are just average, but again its just an added feature and decent enough to place the creeping elements in a puddle of confusion. For alarm, it can also blink a pretty bright white LED near the camera lens, along with sound.Only thing that remains to be seen is its 24x7 performance and durability. I've put it on duty, and will update this review after a month or so.

The first difference i found compared to Mi cameras is that it covers a smaller portion of the room, i.e. the camera isn't a wide angled one that covers most of the room.Secondly the app doesn't have high and low quality streaming options so the video is super laggy if you've chosen 1080p recording mode.During night vision the IR lights show as red color bulbs on the camera, making it look very cheap.Cable is quite long which is a good thing, but it's not a USB cable so replacement isn't as easy as getting a new USB cable.There is no way to delete specific clips from the recordings.
